attributes.action: Give us a "not content with any box "on ballot papers in any future election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This box would prevent voters who abstain from being classed as apathetic.
In the Welsh Assembly Elections for example,should you not be in favour of the assembly your only option is to not vote or spoil your paper.In the general election all non-voters are classed as apathetic when this is not necessarily the case.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
